FuncDef: The display isis ldp-sync interface command displays the synchronization status of interfaces on which LDP and IS-IS synchronization is enabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an IS-IS process.
The process ID is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Examples: Ldp Sync interface information for ISIS(1)
Interface    HoldDownTimer    HoldMaxCostTimer   LDP State   Sync State
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the synchronization status of all the interfaces on which LDP and IS-IS synchronization is enabled, run the display isis ldp-sync interface command.
